teach_intro_1: 1 This feature provides a tutorial on how to capture images using the AMB82 camera.
teach_intro_2: 2 First, connect the CH340 port of the AMB82 mini to your computer via USB and open the Arduino IDE.
teach_intro_3: 3 Open the AmebaUSB / UVC_device example from the AMB82 mini examples.
teach_intro_4: 4 Upload the code directly to the AMB82 mini development board.
teach_intro_5: 5 After uploading, insert the AMB USB cable into another USB port on the 8735.
teach_intro_6: 6 Re-run this program and select 'AMB82 Photo Capture' to start taking photos.
